duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical support and troubleshooting for network topologies, network protocols, and operating systems/virtualization.
Conduct problem solving and troubleshooting, using various data collection tools and methodologies to analyze and resolve customer issues.
Drive discussions remotely with authority and collaborate with teams to resolve complex product issues.
Develop and nurture relationships over long distances using remote technologies like Teams.
Analyze patterns of problems and identify workflows to optimize support engineering delivery.
Collaborate on cross-team and cross-product technical issues to resolve complex customer issues.

education_certification.credential: None required. CKA (Certified Kubernetes Administrator) is a major plus.
